footer.text: Built with passion by Jillian and Vianney

blue-mountain.title: First date
blue-mountain.description: One of our first dates was at Blue Mountain, where we spent an afternoon snowboarding.

france.title: First trip
france.description: Our first trip was in France and Portugal. Jill met Vianney's family for the first time.

alberta.title: First summer vacation
alberta.description: In summer 2019 we travelled to the Rockies in Alberta where we spent a week camping.

tofino.title: Surfing on the west coast
tofino.description: In Fall 2019 we went on a surf trip on the Vancouver Island.

arizona.title: Winter break in the sun
arizona.description: Just before covid hit, we were able to spend some time in Arizona.

lake-superior.title: Visiting the North
lake-superior.description: A long road trip around Lake Superior

cambridge.title: Moving together
cambridge.description: We moved togther in a Condo in Cambridge

engagement.title: The proposal
engagement.description: On November 26th Vianney proposed and Jill said "Oui".
